title: Heart of the Dragon (1985) Jackie Chan | Fists of Fury, Hearts of Gold!

sources.title: Heart of the Dragon (1985) Jackie Chan | Fists of Fury, Hearts of Gold!
sources.description:
Story of a cop who forsakes his dreams of sailing around the world so that he can care for his mentally disabled brother. Innocently caught up in a gangland fight, the brother is kidnapped to force the cop to turn over a police informant.

Original Title: Long de xin
Alternative Title: Heart of the Dragon

Director: Sammo Hung
Writer: Barry Wong

Main Cast:
Jackie Chan - Ted / Tat Fung
Sammo Hung Kam-Bo - Danny / Dodo Fung
Emily Chu Bo-Yee - Jenny
Mang Hoi - Yan

Genres: Martial Arts, Action, Comedy, Crime, Drama, Thriller
Release Date: October 16, 1985
Filming Location: Hong Kong

Availability varies by region
https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL2gsu7VGzgdbtxZGahjOpER2huEhTG9Rb
